request.description:
### Add Invoice
This endpoint allows the user to add a new invoice with the specified details.

#### Request Body
- `receiver_name` (string): Name of the receiver.
- `street` (string): Street address of the receiver.
- `city` (string): City of the receiver.
- `state` (string): State of the receiver.
- `zip` (string): Zip code of the receiver.
- `cart` (array): Array of items in the cart.
    - `description` (string): Description of the item.
    - `quantity` (number): Quantity of the item.
    - `price` (string): Price of the item.
- `services` (array): Array of services.

#### Response
- `id` (number): ID of the invoice.
- `user_id` (number): ID of the user.
- `expense` (string): Expense details.
- `creation_date` (string): Date of creation.
- `isSigned` (number): Indicates if the invoice is signed.
- `signature_date` (string): Date of signature.
- `isActive` (number): Indicates if the invoice is active.
- `receiver_name` (string): Name of the receiver.
- `receiver_street` (string): Street address of the receiver.
- `receiver_city` (string): City of the receiver.
- `receiver_state` (string): State of the receiver.
- `receiver_zip` (string): Zip code of the receiver.
- `items` (array): Array of items in the invoice.
    - `item_id` (number): ID of the item.
    - `item_description` (string): Description of the item.
    - `item_quantity` (number): Quantity of the item.
    - `item_price` (string): Price of the item.
- `services` (array): Array of services.
    - `service_id` (number): ID of the service.
    - `service_label` (string): Label of the service.

#### Example
```json
{
    "receiver_name": "John Doe",
    "street": "123 Main St",
    "city": "Anytown",
    "state": "CA",
    "zip": "12345",
    "cart": [
        {
            "description": "Product 1",
            "quantity": 2,
            "price": "25.00"
        }
    ],
    "services": [1, 2]
}
